trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition> of each branch is determined before the branch is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>di ogni ramo viene determinata prima dell'esecuzione del ramo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>

trans-unit.source: The first IfElseBranchActivity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> that evaluates to `true` is run.
trans-unit.target: Il primo IfElseBranchActivity nel <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>che restituisce `true` viene eseguito.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> object reference for the current branch activity.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> oggetto di riferimento per l'attività del ramo corrente.

trans-unit.source: The evaluation of this condition returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: La valutazione di questa condizione restituisce un valore che indica se questo ramo deve essere eseguito.

trans-unit.source: This property is optional on the last <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> and required in other cases.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è facoltativa nell'ultimo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>nel <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>mentre è obbligatoria in altri casi.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> che restituisce un valore che indica se questo ramo deve essere eseguito.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*>
